___name.description: The short name of the organization used in URLs and references.

___full_name.description: The full name of the organization.

___guid.description: A GUID unique to the organization.

___url.description: The URL to the created organization.

___private_key.description: The private key generated for the validator client.

$eref.description: The name of a Chef object.

___clientname.description: The name of the validator client.
